last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 7
last_episode_to_air.overview: Following Samantha's somber one-person play, an eager fan kidnaps the actress in order to try and convince her to be happy and optimistic again.

name: Samantha!
overview: A child star in the '80s, Samantha clings to the fringes of celebrity with hilarious harebrained schemes to launch herself back into the spotlight.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Samantha's ex Dodói returns from prison and tries to prove he's a responsible parent, she realizes her career could benefit from his homecoming.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Samantha and Dodói shoot a beer commercial together, but the script's storyline proves challenging for both of them in different ways.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Brandon tries to whip his father into shape, Samantha guest-stars as a judge on a singing competition show, and Cindy surprises her entire family.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Dodói unknowingly hooks up with social media celebrity Laila. Samantha attempts to gain Instagram followers by taking a trip to "Paris."

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When Samantha gets pulled into a reality show romance, her entire family is affected. Dodói tests out a career as a sports commentator on the radio.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: To turn her bad karma around, Samantha sets out to honor Ciggy's last request: that the Plimplom Gang reunite and spread his ashes in Varre-Sai.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A face from the Plimploms' past returns to drop a bombshell on Samantha. Left at home without adult supervision, Cindy and Brandon get into trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When Samantha's ex-bandmates adapt a tell-all book about her into a movie that publicly denounces her as immature, she sets out to prove them wrong.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Dodói spends the day trying to please his mother. Samantha decides to take a break from the media as Tico and Porky cast an actress to play her.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Samantha tries out feminism, much to Cindy's dismay. Dodói goes to therapy. Brandon's grandmother persuades him to test out a new passion.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In an attempt to win over an experimental theater director, Samantha attends a party with Dodói, who draws attention. Laila offers Cindy love advice.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Carmen struggles to elicit feelings from Samantha, and even resorts to using a straitjacket, as the child star tries to suppress her emotional past.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: When Samantha is unable to say the word "orphan," she enlists a specialist to help her mentally return to a pivotal moment in her career.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Following Samantha's somber one-person play, an eager fan kidnaps the actress in order to try and convince her to be happy and optimistic again.
